node.name: Pop Filter for microphone MAKE: MAONO MODEL: AU-B00
node.description: Adjustable wind screen filter mask for microphone that cuts unwanted noise of breathing and 360 degree gooseneck holder for the variation of position as per user comfort level. No software required and give best efficiency with acoustic panel behind. (SIZE: 100mm Diameter / WEIGHT: 180 grams)
node.content: The porous material of filter screen absorb the mutter noise of breathing before entering to microphone / Adjustable clamp with goose-neck design make itself fix to any position, also provide the elongation up to 300mm which is enough to bring the pop filter screen near to mouth / No additional software is required to use this pop filter and hardware itself is sufficient to work properly with microphone / For getting good performance it is recommended to use acoustic panel on wall, behind the pop filter setup / A piggy bank item for personal use like you-tubers and mimicry artists.
node.alt: Maono AU-B00 Pop Filter for Studio Condenser Microphone with Wind Screen and Metal Gooseneck Holder

node.name: Broadcasting microphone kit MAKE: TECHTEST MODEL: BM800
node.description: A Complete studio microphone kit for professionals with voice sensitivity up to 45dB and 3.5mm splitter audio port. Mic has inbuilt voice filter, splitter which is compatible with most of the regular devices and also it is compatible to online audio softwares. (SIZE: 300mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 820 grams)
node.content: It contain 6 different items to ensure the professional voice input while using any mic angle or level or proximity / External echo dampness, noise controller for crispness of input sound are some inbuilt features to reduce the confusion on setup / 20Hz-20kHz is range of frequency it can reproduce which is nearby to human audible range and under soundproof room or studio it can collect digital HD sound which can be compare to sound of HD movies / Certified combination and economical range for all recording devices while its technical design support common mic software's available online like VoiceMeeter, WO mic or Matrix Mic. It automatically setup a healthy level at -10dB range when speak into mic at time of recording.
node.alt: Techtest BM800 Broadcasting Studio Recording Condenser Microphone Mic Kit with Plastic Shock Mount Adjustable Suspension Scissor Arm Stand Pop Filter 3.5mm Audio Jack to Headphone Microphone Splitter

node.name: Maono AU-A04 Condenser Microphone Kit (Black) MAKE: MAONO
node.description: Upgraded, ultraHD, condenser microphone kit for industrial recording and broadcasting which comes with standard 3.5mm audio jack. End to end voice quality filters and once a time investment item.  (SIZE: 400mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 800 grams)
node.content: It is 4 unit setup with dynamic output range and sensitivity that can identify and tune two different voices during dual audio performance / Declutter the unwanted input frequencies and result in ultraHD voice output which is mandatory for recording studio / Quiet easy to dismantle the arrangement and durable fittings are made with standard materials / Highly recommended for duet performers in singing and other audio input means while no software is required with it / In addition there is also a 3.5mm headphone jack that allows singers to monitor the input of what they are recording in real-time / With real time audio snugging it is mostly preferred  by vloggers & youtubers.
node.alt: Honeytecs Professional Studio Broadcasting Recording Condenser Microphone Mic Kit Set 3.5mm with Shock Mount Adjustable Suspension Scissor Arm Stand Mounting Clamp Pop Filter Mic Clip

node.name: Condenser USB microphone kit MAKE: FIFINE MODEL: T669
node.description: With plug-and-play connection through USB, double pop filter before microphone and wide frequency response, it can easily handle high sound pressure levels to reduce distortion. The adjustable arm of microphone kit has reach of 2.5 feet and table-hugging design offer no facial obstruction at performance which generally has the problem with other recording devices.  (SIZE: 400mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 700 grams)
node.content: In recent years USB ports are preferred over audio jack(3.5mm) for any audio input/output because of better signal conversion and also compatibility with number of devices like ADC(Analog-to-Digital-Conversion) & DAC(Digital-to-Analog-Conversion) / With adjustable gain, microphone of this setup sends signal through inbuilt mixer where level of noise are splits and unwanted pattern like echo, muttering are discarded / It has double pop filter as well, to discard initial unwanted breathing noise completely / With scissor arm which can elongate to 2.5 feet and c-clamp to fix the setup in any narrow edges, it is quiet handy to use and comes with 1 year warranty / Although software is not suggested to use but some users shared a good experience with software & this microphone kit.
node.alt: Fifine T669 Condenser USB Microphone Kit with Adjustable Scissor Arm Stand Shock Mount for PC and MAC Only (Does not work with Mobile)

(SIZE: 400mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 700 grams)
